message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. Considering the product's unique features and my initial offer of $900000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $825000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects its true value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not convinced that $825000 is the best price. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and the features of the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $750000. Considering the product's unique features and the value it brings, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm offering it to you for $800000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the market value.

I appreciate your willingness to make one last compromise, but I'm still not willing to pay $800000. I'm willing to meet you at $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's features and market value.
